name: part_002
file: tmp_【 重大告知あり‼ 】#鷹嶺ルイ2周年LIVE 『ANIMAL』【3D LIVE】 [oU85vmx7jn8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Short instrumental interlude with artistic visuals of the moon and cherry blossoms.
Takane Lui performs the song 'Uma to Shika'.

subtitles.original: 吐いて、燃えないゴミにするんだ。
subtitles.english: I'll spit it out and turn it into non-burnable trash.

subtitles.original: なんで　なんで
subtitles.english: Why? Why?

subtitles.original: なんで　なんで　なんで　なんで
subtitles.english: Why? Why? Why? Why?

subtitles.original: なんで　なんで
subtitles.english: Why? Why?

subtitles.original: ねえ　あたしのことが好きなら
subtitles.english: Hey, if you like me...

subtitles.original: 気付いて　気付いて　気付いて　気付いて
subtitles.english: Notice me, notice me, notice me, notice me!

subtitles.original: 夢を見せてよ
subtitles.english: Show me a dream.

subtitles.original: どうしてわかってくれないの
subtitles.english: Why won't you understand?

subtitles.original: 嫌いだ　嫌いだ　嫌いだ　嫌いだ　大嫌いだ
subtitles.english: I hate you, I hate you, I hate you, I hate you, I hate you so much!

subtitles.original: あなたの振り向かないの
subtitles.english: You don't even look back.

subtitles.original: 気付いてる　気付いてる　気付いてる　気付いてる
subtitles.english: You know, you know, you know, you know...

subtitles.original: くせに　あたしはどうしてバカ変われないの
subtitles.english: Even though you know, why am I such a fool who can't change?

subtitles.original: したいよ　したいよ　したいよ　したいよ
subtitles.english: I want to, I want to, I want to, I want to...

subtitles.original: 離れたくないよ
subtitles.english: I don't want to leave you.

subtitles.original: かさなる感情　流れ星　1... 2... の合図で
subtitles.english: Overlapping emotions, a shooting star, at the signal of 1... 2...

subtitles.original: あの人のこと祝ってあげるわ
subtitles.english: I'll celebrate that person for you.

subtitles.original: ねえ　最期にギュッとさせてほしい
subtitles.english: Hey, let me hold you tight one last time.

subtitles.original: ありがとう　ありがとう　ありがとう　ありがとう
subtitles.english: Thank you, thank you, thank you, thank you.

subtitles.original: これであなたも...
subtitles.english: With this, you too...

subtitles.original: 往生しようぜこの浮世は三千里
subtitles.english: Let's give it up, this fleeting world is three thousand miles.

subtitles.original: 雨曝して隠遁　甘酸っぱいばっかのアイロニー
subtitles.english: Left in the rain, in seclusion, an irony full of only bittersweetness.

subtitles.original: 微糖じゃ達しないどうせこの日々は忙しない
subtitles.english: A little sweetness won't suffice, these days are busy anyway.

subtitles.original: ちょっと目が合った手と手と
subtitles.english: Our eyes met for a second, hand in hand.

subtitles.original: 現せその声で
subtitles.english: Show it with that voice of yours.

subtitles.original: あー　遊び遊ばせて
subtitles.english: Ah, let me play and be played with.

subtitles.original: 手の鳴る方へ
subtitles.english: To where the hands clap.

subtitles.original: 浅ましい　喧しい
subtitles.english: Miserable and noisy.

subtitles.original: 喧しい
subtitles.english: Noisy.

subtitles.original: 泣きっ面に蜂逃げ場もなくて
subtitles.english: Misfortunes pile up with nowhere to run.

subtitles.original: ほら、この夜は空騒ぎ
subtitles.english: Look, this night is much ado about nothing.

subtitles.original: 想像したってこの浮世は三千里
subtitles.english: Even in imagination, this fleeting world is three thousand miles.

subtitles.original: 空回りの毎日　疑って焦っては怠惰に
subtitles.english: Spinning wheels every day, doubting and rushing into laziness.

subtitles.original: 哀落は日々忙しない　そぞろに吹くは青嵐
subtitles.english: The days of decline are busy, a sudden summer wind blows.

subtitles.original: まともに見つめ合った目と目と
subtitles.english: Our eyes met properly for a moment.

subtitles.original: あの人は恋敵
subtitles.english: That person is a love rival.

subtitles.original: 混じり合えない　二人
subtitles.english: Two people who can't mix together.

subtitles.original: 小波浮世に　身を任せたら
subtitles.english: Leaving myself to the ripples of this fleeting world.

subtitles.original: もう左様なら知らない街で
subtitles.english: Goodbye now, in a city I don't know.

subtitles.original: また出会いましょう
subtitles.english: Let's meet again.

subtitles.original: あー　遊び遊ばせて
subtitles.english: Ah, let me play and be played with.

subtitles.original: 手の鳴る方へ
subtitles.english: To where the hands clap.

subtitles.original: 見惚れて射止めて
subtitles.english: Be fascinated and shoot through.

subtitles.original: 恋心
subtitles.english: A heart in love.

subtitles.original: 花びらハラヒラ舞いふたつ
subtitles.english: Two flower petals fluttering and dancing.

subtitles.original: 法螺、あの人も嘘つき？
subtitles.english: Look, is that person a liar too?

subtitles.original: あー　遊び遊ばせて
subtitles.english: Ah, let me play and be played with.

subtitles.original: 手の鳴る方へ
subtitles.english: To where the hands clap.

subtitles.original: 浅ましい　喧しい
subtitles.english: Miserable and noisy.

subtitles.original: 喧しい
subtitles.english: Noisy.

subtitles.original: 飲み干せ飽くまで果てるまで
subtitles.english: Drink it up to your heart's content, until the very end.

subtitles.original: なんせこの夜は寂しがり
subtitles.english: After all, this night is a lonely one.

subtitles.original: 間抜けな醜態だ金輪際のさよなら
subtitles.english: What a foolish sight, a final goodbye.

subtitles.original: 求め合うほどに罪深き
subtitles.english: The more we seek each other, the more sinful it becomes.

subtitles.original: 飲み干せ飽くまで果てるまで
subtitles.english: Drink it up to your heart's content, until the very end.

subtitles.original: なんせこの世は救いあり
subtitles.english: After all, there is salvation in this world.

subtitles.original: あー　遊び遊ばせて
subtitles.english: Ah, let me play and be played with.

subtitles.original: 手の鳴る方へ
subtitles.english: To where the hands clap.

subtitles.original: この世は猿芝居
subtitles.english: This world is a monkey show.

subtitles.original: 歪んで傷だらけの春
subtitles.english: A distorted spring, covered in wounds.

subtitles.original: 麻酔も打たずに歩いた
subtitles.english: I walked without even having anesthesia.

subtitles.original: 体の奥底で響く
subtitles.english: Echoing deep within my body.

subtitles.original: 生き足りないと強く
subtitles.english: Strongly feeling I haven't lived enough.

subtitles.original: まだ味わうさ　噛み終えたガムの味
subtitles.english: I'll still taste it, the flavor of a chewed-up piece of gum.

subtitles.original: 冷めきれないままの心で
subtitles.english: With a heart that still hasn't cooled down.

subtitles.original: 一つ一つ失くした果てに
subtitles.english: After losing things one by one...

subtitles.original: ようやく残ったもの
subtitles.english: ...the things that finally remained.
